akn:section.akn:heading: Notice of graffiti nuisance and reply.

akn:content.akn:p: The notice shall include reply space for the owner to notify the Mayor whether the owner:

The notice shall also include a deadline by when the owner must reply and shall inform the owner how to reply. The owner shall reply by either conspicuously posting the notice to the premises where it was originally left, transmitting the notice by facsimile to the number indicated on the notice, mailing it to the address indicated on the notice, returning it in person, or using any other method authorized by regulation and specified on the notice. The deadline shall be not less than 7 calendar days.
